Typealiases.html#/s:13UrbanPiperSDK13API.name: APICompletion
Typealiases.html#/s:13UrbanPiperSDK13API.abstract: Callback that is called when the api call succeeds with the relevant response object

Typealiases.html#/s:13UrbanPiperSDK10API.name: APIFailure
Typealiases.html#/s:13UrbanPiperSDK10API.abstract: Callback that is called when the api call fails with an error object

Extensions/NSNotification/Name.html#/s:S.name: sessionExpired
Extensions/NSNotification/Name.html#/s:S.abstract: Notification posted when the users session has expired

Extensions/NSNotification/Name.html#/s:S.name: userInfoChanged
Extensions/NSNotification/Name.html#/s:S.abstract: Notification posted when the user details are changed

Extensions/NSNotification/Name.html#/s:S.name: userBizInfoChanged
Extensions/NSNotification/Name.html#/s:S.abstract: Notification posted when the user biz details(i.e points, balance etc) are changed

Enums/SDKEvent.html.name: SDKEvent
Enums/SDKEvent.html.abstract: Events that should be handled by the SDK client, the event are passed to the client via the callback of the SDK initializer

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@M@UrbanPi.name: sharedInstance()
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@M@UrbanPi.abstract: Returns the shared instance that was initialized

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: intialize(language:bizId:apiUsername:apiKey:callback:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: Intializes the UrbanPiperSDK, the initialized instance of the SDK is accessible via the static func sharedInstance()

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: change(language:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: API call to change the language of the SDK after the SDK has been initialized

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: currentLanguage()
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: Returns the language in the SDK

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.name: getUser()
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.abstract: Returns the saved User object for a logged in user and nil for a guest user

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: startRegistration()
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: Returns a helper class that contains the api calls to perform a user registration

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: startSocialRegistration()
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: Returns a helper class that contains the api calls to perform a social user registration

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: startPasswordReset()
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: Returns a helper class that contains the api calls to perform a password reset

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: logout()
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: API call to logout the user

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: login(username:password:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: Use this function to Log-in the user if the user has been registered previously by passing in the username and password

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: socialLogin(email:socialLoginProvider:accessToken:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: Use this function to perform a social login with the data from the social login providers, if the value message varible is phone_number_required the user has to be registered, to register a social login user call startSocialRegistration

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.name: refreshUserInfo(completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.abstract: Fetches the user info from the server, user needs to be logged in to call this function

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.name: refreshUserBizInfo(completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.abstract: Fetches the users biz info (balance, points) for the server, user needs to be logged in to call this function

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.name: updateUserInfo(name:email:gender:anniversary:birthday:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.abstract: Use this function to update the user details by setting the relevant parameters,

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.name: changePassword(phone:oldPassword:newPassword:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.abstract: Use this function to change the password of a logged in user, the password cannot be changed for a social login user, user needs to be logged in to call this function

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.name: getDeliverableAddresses(storeId:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.abstract: Get the deliverable address for the provided store id, user needs to be logged in to call this function

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.name: addAddress(address:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.abstract: Use this function to add a new address to the users saved address list, user needs to be logged in to call this function

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: updateAddress(address:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: Use this function to update a given address, user needs to be logged in to call this function

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.name: deleteAddress(addressId:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.abstract: Use this funtion to delete an address, user needs to be logged in to call this function

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: getWalletTransactions(completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: Get the users wallet transactions, user needs to be logged in to call this function

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.name: getPastOrders(completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.abstract: Get the users past orders, user needs to be logged in to call this function

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.name: getPastOrderDetails(orderId:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.abstract: Get the users past order details, user needs to be logged in to call this function

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.name: redeemReward(rewardId:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.abstract: Use this function to reedem the reward from the getRewards() fucntion, user needs to be logged in to call this function

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: getNotifications(completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: Get the list of users notfications, user needs to be logged in to call this function

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.name: submitFeedback(name:rating:orderId:choiceText:comments:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.abstract: Use this method to submit the feedback to an completed order, user needs to be logged in to call this function

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: getItemLikes(offset:limit:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: Get the items that where liked by the user, user needs to be logged in to call this function

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: likeItem(itemId:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: Use this function to like an item, user needs to be logged in to call this function

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: unlikeItem(itemId:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: Use this function to unlike an item, user needs to be logged in to call this function

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.name: initWalletReload(amount:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.abstract: This funtion is used to initate a user wallet reload, user needs to be logged in to call this function

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.name: verifyWalletReload(pid:transactionId:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.abstract: Use this function to verify a wallet reload completed using a payment gateway

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: registerForFCMToken(token:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: Register the fcm token in urbanpiper server to receive the push notifications

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: checkAppVersion(version:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: API call to perform an version check with the urbanpiper server to indi

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: getNearestStore(lat:lng:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: API call used to get the nearest store to the provided lat lng

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.name: getAllStores(completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.abstract: Get all the stores registered for the business

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: getCategories(storeId:offset:limit:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: Get the list of categories set up for the business

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: getCategoryItems(categoryId:storeId:offset:limit:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: Get the items for a given category

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: searchItems(query:storeId:offset:limit:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: API call to search items for a provided keyword

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: getFilterAndSortOptions(categoryid:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: Get the filter and sort options for a category

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: getItemDetails(itemId:storeId:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: Get the item details for a given item id

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: getFeaturedItems(storeId:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: Get the list of featured items

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: getAssociatedItems(itemId:storeId:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: Get the list of associated items for the provided item id

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.name: getRewards(completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.abstract: Get the list of rewards from the server

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: getOffers(offset:limit:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: Get the list of offers from the server

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: getBanners(completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: Get the list of banners from the server

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: startCheckout()
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: Returns a helper class that contains the api calls to place an order

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: cartItems()
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: Returns a list of items added to the cart

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: getItemCountFor(itemId:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: Returns the item quantity added to the cart for a given item id

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.name: cartValue()
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.abstract: The total value of the cart factoring item quanities and the options selected

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.name: addItemToCart(cartItem:quantity:notes:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.abstract: API call to add an cart item to the cart with the item quantity to be added and the notes for the item

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: removeItemFromCart(itemId:quantity:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: Fuction to reduce the item quantity by the passed in quantity from cart

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.name: clearCart()
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.abstract: API call to clear all the items in the cart

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.name: getRelatedItemsForCart(itemIds:storeId:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/s:13UrbanPip.abstract: API call to retrive the item related to the cart ids provided

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.name: reorder(orderId:lat:lng:storeId:completion:failure:)
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html#/c:@CM@UrbanP.abstract: Perform a reorder of an past order

Classes/UPError.html#/s:13UrbanPiperSDK7.name: data
Classes/UPError.html#/s:13UrbanPiperSDK7.abstract: Optional. Returns the data object from the failed api call

Classes/UPError.html#/s:13UrbanPiperSDK7.name: response
Classes/UPError.html#/s:13UrbanPiperSDK7.abstract: Optional. Returns the response object from the failed api call

Classes/UPError.html#/s:13UrbanPiperSDK7.name: responseDictionary
Classes/UPError.html#/s:13UrbanPiperSDK7.abstract: Optional. Returns a dictionary instance de-serialized from the json data object of the failed api call

Classes/UPError.html#/s:13UrbanPiperSDK7.name: httpStatusCode
Classes/UPError.html#/s:13UrbanPiperSDK7.abstract: Optional. Returns The HTTP status code of the failed api call

Classes/UPError.html#/s:13UrbanPiperSDK7.name: errorMessage
Classes/UPError.html#/s:13UrbanPiperSDK7.abstract: Returns the error message from the server if server error message is non nil else return the localizedDescription from the error object of the failed api call

Classes/SocialRegBuilder.html#/s:13Urban.name: verifyPhone(name:phone:email:gender:provider:providerAccessToken:completion:failure:)
Classes/SocialRegBuilder.html#/s:13Urban.abstract: API call to check if the passed in phone number is already present in the system

Classes/SocialRegBuilder.html#/s:13Urban.name: registerSocialUser(completion:failure:)
Classes/SocialRegBuilder.html#/s:13Urban.abstract: Funtion to register a new social login user

Classes/SocialRegBuilder.html#/s:13Urban.name: verifyRegOTP(otp:completion:failure:)
Classes/SocialRegBuilder.html#/s:13Urban.abstract: API call to verify the OTP sent to the users phone number during registration, this function should be called only when the callback response message from registration is User has successfully been registered.

Classes/SocialRegBuilder.html#/s:13Urban.name: resendRegOTP(completion:failure:)
Classes/SocialRegBuilder.html#/s:13Urban.abstract: API call the resend the OTP to the phone number passed in the registerSocialUser api call

Classes/SocialRegBuilder.html#/s:13Urban.name: verifySocialOTP(otp:completion:failure:)
Classes/SocialRegBuilder.html#/s:13Urban.abstract: API call to verify the OTP sent to the users phone number during verifyPhone api call, this function can be used for all the case other than new_registration_required

Classes/SocialRegBuilder.html#/s:13Urban.name: resendSocialOTP(completion:failure:)
Classes/SocialRegBuilder.html#/s:13Urban.abstract: API call the resend the OTP to the phone number passed in the verifyPhone api call, this function can be used for all the case other than new_registration_required

Classes/ResetPasswordBuilder.html#/s:13U.name: forgotPassword(phone:completion:failure:)
Classes/ResetPasswordBuilder.html#/s:13U.abstract: API call sends an otp to the phone number passed in if the phone number is registered in the sytem, the phone number needs to contain the country code

Classes/ResetPasswordBuilder.html#/s:13U.name: resetPassword(otp:password:confirmPassword:completion:failure:)
Classes/ResetPasswordBuilder.html#/s:13U.abstract: API call to reset the password of the user

Classes/RegistrationBuilder.html#/s:13Ur.name: registerUser(phone:name:email:password:completion:failure:)
Classes/RegistrationBuilder.html#/s:13Ur.abstract: API call to register an user to your business

Classes/RegistrationBuilder.html#/s:13Ur.name: verifyRegOTP(phone:otp:completion:failure:)
Classes/RegistrationBuilder.html#/s:13Ur.abstract: API call to verify the otp sent to the users phone number

Classes/RegistrationBuilder.html#/s:13Ur.name: resendRegOTP(phone:completion:failure:)
Classes/RegistrationBuilder.html#/s:13Ur.abstract: Send a new otp to the passed in users phone number

Classes/ItemOptionBuilder.html#/s:13Urba.name: totalAmount
Classes/ItemOptionBuilder.html#/s:13Urba.abstract: the current total value of the item with the added options

Classes/ItemOptionBuilder.html#/c:@M@Urb.name: init(item:)
Classes/ItemOptionBuilder.html#/c:@M@Urb.abstract: The initializer takes the item as a parameter

Classes/ItemOptionBuilder.html#/s:13Urba.name: selectedOptionsFor(groupId:)
Classes/ItemOptionBuilder.html#/s:13Urba.abstract: Funtion returns a list of itemoptions that where added for a given group id

Classes/ItemOptionBuilder.html#/s:13Urba.name: addOption(groupId:option:)
Classes/ItemOptionBuilder.html#/s:13Urba.abstract: Function to add an item option to the ItemOptionBuilder

Classes/ItemOptionBuilder.html#/s:13Urba.name: removeOption(groupId:option:)
Classes/ItemOptionBuilder.html#/s:13Urba.abstract: Funtion to remove a itemoption from ItemOptionBuilder

Classes/ItemOptionBuilder.html#/s:13Urba.name: build()
Classes/ItemOptionBuilder.html#/s:13Urba.abstract: Build function validates if the ItemOptions have been added according to the values specified by the minSelectable and maxSelectable variables in the ItemOptionGroup

Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html#/s:13UrbanP.name: getPaymentModes
Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html#/s:13UrbanP.abstract: Returns a list of payment options supported by the business, the validateCart function has to be called atleast once to return the payment options

Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html#/s:13UrbanP.name: validateCart(store:useWalletCredits:deliveryOption:cartItems:orderTotal:completion:failure:)
Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html#/s:13UrbanP.abstract: Use this function to validate the items in cart, get the supported payments options, get order details such as taxes, delivery charges, payment charges etc.

Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html#/s:13UrbanP.name: validateCoupon(code:completion:failure:)
Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html#/s:13UrbanP.abstract: Apply a coupon to the cart items using this function, the coupon code can either be a code from the getCoupons api call or a code entered by the user

Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html#/s:13UrbanP.name: clearCoupon()
Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html#/s:13UrbanP.abstract: call this funtion when the clear the applied coupon

Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html#/s:13UrbanP.name: initPayment(paymentOption:completion:failure:)
Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html#/s:13UrbanP.abstract: Call this function to initialize a payment in the urbanpiper server before performing a payment for all the payment options except Cash On Delivery, for COD you can skip this function and call directly the place order function

Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html#/s:13UrbanP.name: placeOrder(address:deliveryDate:deliveryTime:timeSlot:paymentOption:instructions:phone:completion:failure:)
Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html#/s:13UrbanP.abstract: API call to place the order in urbanpiper server

Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html#/c:@M@Urban.name: verifyPayment(pid:completion:failure:)
Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html#/c:@M@Urban.abstract: API call the verify the payment transaction with the UrbanPiper server for payment gateway payment option

Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html.name: CheckoutBuilder
Classes/CheckoutBuilder.html.abstract: A helper class that contains the related api’s to place an order. The api’s have to be called in the following order.

Classes/ItemOptionBuilder.html.name: ItemOptionBuilder
Classes/ItemOptionBuilder.html.abstract: ItemOptionBuilder is a helper class to create a cartItem with item options.

Classes/RegistrationBuilder.html.name: RegistrationBuilder
Classes/RegistrationBuilder.html.abstract: A helper class that contains the related api’s to register an user. The api’s have to be called in the following order.

Classes/ResetPasswordBuilder.html.name: ResetPasswordBuilder
Classes/ResetPasswordBuilder.html.abstract: A helper class that contains the related api’s to reset the users password. The api’s have to be called in the following order.

Classes/SocialRegBuilder.html.name: SocialRegBuilder
Classes/SocialRegBuilder.html.abstract: A helper class that contains the related api’s to register a social login user.

Classes/UPError.html.name: UPError
Classes/UPError.html.abstract: The error class that is returned in case of api call failure via the APIFailure callback

Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html.name: UrbanPiperSDK
Classes/UrbanPiperSDK.html.abstract: The primary class for integrating UrbanPiperSDK in your app

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
